items.name: MMF
items.description: A modular framework for vision & language multimodal research.

items.name: NeMo
items.description: A scalable generative AI framework built for researchers and developers working on Large Language Models, Multimodal, and Speech AI (Automatic Speech Recognition and Text-to-Speech)

items.name: USB
items.description: Benchmark tool for developing and evaluating Semi-suprevised learning algorithms.  Includes an implementation of 14 SSL algorithms and 15 tasks for evaluation for CV, NLP, and Audio
